synopsis.text:
Flying in on his trusty Kinto-Un, Son Goku makes a grand entrance at the highly anticipated 'First Strongest Hero Fighting Tournament' in Japan. With a massive crowd eagerly awaiting the start of the event, Miyake Masaharu is poised to kick things off, but not before the arrival of a special guest. As Miyake-san spots the distant figure of Goku, the legendary warrior eagerly prepares to face off against the strongest competitors. However, much to his surprise, Goku is instead asked to provide commentary for the tournament. Disappointed but still excited, Goku agrees, hoping to witness some truly powerful opponents in action.

In a special introduction video for the 'Japan Great People Award 2007', broadcast live on Fuji TV, the achievements of history's most remarkable figures are showcased. With unexpected faces and inspiring stories, these great men and women are nominated across various categories, much like the Academy Awards. As the excitement builds, the audience eagerly awaits the announcement of the grand prize winner.

Under the watchful eyes of a massive crowd, 'The First Strongest Hero Fighting Tournament' is about to commence, with Miyake Masaharu at the helm. As he eagerly awaits the arrival of a special guest, he spots Son Goku soaring through the sky on his Flying Nimbus. With a spectacular landing and a quick demonstration of his martial arts prowess, Goku is more than ready to face off against the strongest heroes. However, Miyake-san has other plans and invites Goku to commentate instead, promising him a front-row seat to witness incredible displays of strength.
synopsis.author: mistral.mistral-large-2402-v1:0
